snippet: When word got out that the Obama administration planned to approach the major sports leagues to promote reform, Republican leaders decided to commit interference.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Republican leaders for drafting letters to top professional sports organizations discouraging them from helping publicize benefits of health care reform law; laments that letter seems to be working, with NFL saying it has no plans to join effort.
lead_paragraph: When word got out that the Obama administration planned to approach the major sports leagues to promote reform, Republican leaders decided to commit interference.

headline.main: A Chance for Pro Sports to Help on Health Care
headline.print_headline: A Chance for Pro Sports to Help on Health Care

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
